#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define MOD 1000000007
#define pii pair<int, int>
#define vi  vector<int>
#define pb  push_back
#define M(a,x) memset(a,x,sizeof(a))
#define sci(x) scanf("%d",&x);
#define scl(x) scanf("%lld",&x);
#define scs(x) scanf("%s",x);
int a[100001]={0};
int main()
{
	a[1]=3;
	a[2]=9;
	a[3]=26;
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	for(int i=4;i<100001;++i)
	{
		a[i]=((a[i-1]%MOD)*(3%MOD))%MOD;
		a[i]=(a[i]-a[i-3]+MOD)%MOD;
	}
	while(t--)
	{
		int n;
		cin>>n;
		cout<<a[n]<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
